lead_paragraph: Automobile recalls set a record last year as stronger government enforcement and widening recalls of exploding airbags pushed the total above 51 million vehicles.

headline.print_headline: 2015 Auto Recalls in U.S. Overtake 2014’s Record
headline.main: 2015 Auto Recalls in U.S. Overtake 2014’s Record

snippet: Automobile recalls set a record last year as stronger government enforcement and widening recalls of exploding airbags pushed the total above 51 million vehicles.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Admin reports over 51 million automobile recalls in 2015, breaking 2014 record by close margin.
